timeline.bodyText:
code-style side-note, I think we probably should be using 'else', it can prevent errors and secondly  it visually makes the logic block look more like a logic block.
If one were to be really consistent here the else if would be converted to an if statement as well.
timeline.author: DanVanAtta

timeline.bodyText: side-note: I think this original error handling is extremely questionable. Since this is a bot server, we should not be in a no-op case, this indicates a likely configuration error. Returning a no-op is probably a silent error.
timeline.author: DanVanAtta
